## `SetDepthLevel`

Sets the depth level\index{web harvester!settings} to crawl from the base URL.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetDepthLevel(number depthLevel)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` depthLevel | The number of level to crawl from the first website. |
:::
